title: Friend has been hack; What can i do?
body:
My friend has recently been hack.
I want to help put in a report on his behalf. How do I do so?

replies.body: I appreciate you reaching out for your friend, but we'll want to assist him directly.  Have him fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will help out as soon as they can.  We'll see him there!
